summoner:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
summoner:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

summoner:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
summoner:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
summoner:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

summoner:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
summoner:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

summoner:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
summoner:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !summoner:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

summoner:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
summoner:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !summoner:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
